channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Out of sync, 2nd April
item.description:
When on Tewkesbury road and stopped at the lights to turn right, it seems that all the lights cycle through a number of times before the lights allow you to turn right causing some cars to overtake, jump the red light and cut across oncoming traffic from the other side to turn right
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 30 Tewkesbury Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Awful bodge repair done to pot hole, 31st March
item.description:
I previously reported this pothole and received an update telling me the hole had been repaired. Please see attached photo. Are you telling me this is a repair! Do you not monitor the work these contracting companies do? They should be force to do it properly as this clearly isn't good enough.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 70 Prestbury Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unsafe pedestrian crossing spot, 31st March
item.description:
There is a pedestrian crossing spot here but with no facilities to make it safe to cross. The proximity to the roundabout on Whittle Way means that it's difficult to know if a car will approach while you're crossing the road. A proper pedestrian crossing of some sort giving pedestrians right of way would make it much safer. Oddly, there is a zebra crossing immediately to the West from here, but it's not safe to access from this location and only serves the petrol station.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Whittle Inn Whittle Way, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unsafe pedestrian crossing spot, 31st March
item.description:
There is a pedestrian crossing spot here across the dual carriageway section of Pioneer avenue, but with no facilities to make it safe to cross. The proximity to the roundabout with delta way means that it's difficult to know if a car will approach while you're crossing the road. A proper pedestrian crossing of some sort here to give pedestrians priority will make it much safer
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Delta Way, Brockworth
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken concrete bollards, 30th March
item.description:
The two concrete bollards adjacent to the fence have been hit and broken off at there base by delivery drivers. These have simply been stood back up on the base but I am concerned a child could climb on them and they could fall on them. They are quite heavy and are not secure.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 7 Lyefield Road West, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bin overflowing for 1 week at a time with dog poo, 28th March
item.description:
The bin here is over flowing on a regular basis for 1 week at a time it's full of dog poo bags and local takeaway boxes On the floor around this bin is dog poo bags some people see a bin and think they can throw them just nearby instead of finding another bin or taking it home with them This bin needs to be emptying daily As it's next to a bench and on a well used dog walking route and a local school It gets emptied 1 a week then it's overflowing by the next day
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Bodgers Mount Mill Lane, Brockworth
Report on FixMyStreet
